Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding disaggregated data in department of education reporting including metrics on students in foster care
Items.MatterName: Expanding disaggregated data in department of education reporting including metrics on students in foster care.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report on funding for restorative justice programming and services
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to report on funding for restorative justice programming and services.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to expand career-connected learning programs and opportunities at all public high schools.
Items.MatterName: Department of Education to expand career-connected learning programs and opportunities at all public high schools.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to report annually on the number of teachers, administrators and school staff who have completed therapeutic crisis intervention in schools training
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE to report annually on the number of teachers, administrators and school staff who have completed therapeutic crisis intervention in schools training.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.7275/A.8210 requiring all district leadership teams to operate under open meetings law requirements.
Items.MatterName: Requiring all district leadership teams to operate under open meetings law requirements. (S.7275/A.8210)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.7279/A.8196, requiring District Leadership Teams and School Leadership Teams to include student representatives.
Items.MatterName: Requiring District Leadership Teams and School Leadership Teams to include student representatives. (S.7279/A.8196)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.7280/A.8194, establishing the citywide leadership team.
